damage.formula: Effective Damage = Weapon Damage × Character Damage
damage.description: Foundational offensive multiplier (e.g., 2.0x = 200% base damage). The most important offensive stat.
damage.example: Weapon Damage 5.0x × Character Damage 3.0x = 15.0x total damage

crit_chance.formula: Standard crits at <100%. Over 100% enables Overcrits!
crit_chance.overcrit_formula: Overcrit Multiplier = (n × 0.5)² + (n + 1) where n = number of simultaneous crits
crit_chance.description: Exceeding 100% Crit Chance enables Overcrits which apply Crit Damage multiple times with exponential scaling

crit_damage.formula: Total Crit Damage = Base Damage × Damage Multiplier × Crit Damage Multiplier × Overcrit Multiplier
crit_damage.description: Extra damage multiplier on critical hits. Pairs with Crit Chance for exponential scaling.
crit_damage.example: Damage 10.0x × Crit Damage 5.0x = 50.0x damage on crits

attack_speed.formula: Attacks Per Second = Base APS × (1 + Attack Speed %)
attack_speed.description: Controls weapon attack frequency. 150% = 1.5x faster attacks. Dramatically increases DPS and proc frequency.
attack_speed.example: Base 1.0 APS × 150% Attack Speed = 2.5 attacks per second

projectile_count.formula: Total Projectiles = Weapon Count + Character Count
projectile_count.description: Number of simultaneous projectiles fired. Each projectile deals full damage.

projectile_bounces.formula: Weapon-specific, cannot be increased via tomes/items
projectile_bounces.description: Number of times projectiles ricochet between enemies. Only upgradeable through weapon level-ups.
projectile_bounces.note: Cannot be boosted by character stats

size.formula: Effective Size = Weapon Size × Character Size
size.description: Projectile/Aura size multiplier. Larger size = more enemies hit simultaneously. Especially powerful for Axe, Tornado, and Black Hole.

projectile_speed.description: Travel velocity multiplier. Affects rotation speed for orbital weapons like Chunkers.

duration.description: Weapon and effect persistence time. Also extends elemental status effects (Freeze, Burn, Poison). Essential for DoT builds.

damage_to_elites.formula: Elite Damage = Base Damage × (1 + Elite Damage %)
damage_to_elites.description: Multiplier specifically against Elite enemies and stage bosses. All stage bosses count as elites.

knockback.description: Enemy push-back distance. Improves enemy control and ranged weapon safety.

max_hp.formula: Total HP = Base HP + HP Bonuses
max_hp.description: Your health pool determining survival capacity. Essential for survivability and Beefy Ring synergy.

hp_regen.description: Health passively regenerated per minute. Regen Tome is the primary source.
hp_regen.note: Displayed per minute but applied continuously

overheal.description: Temporary health beyond normal max HP. Chonkplate is the main source.

shield.description: Protective barrier that absorbs damage before affecting health. Recharges after 5 seconds without damage. Even 5 points can prevent one-shots.

armor.formula: Character Armor % = Internal Armor / (0.75 + Internal Armor)
armor.description: Percentage-based damage reduction with diminishing returns. Impossible to reach 100% due to hyperbolic formula.

evasion.formula: Character Evasion % = Internal Evasion / (1 + Internal Evasion)
evasion.description: Percentage chance to completely avoid incoming damage. Subject to diminishing returns, cannot reach 100%.

lifesteal.formula: At <100%: chance to steal 1 HP per hit. At >100%: chance to steal 2 HP instead
lifesteal.description: Percentage chance to steal HP from enemies per attack. Exceeding 100% increases heal amount. Pairs excellently with high attack speed.

thorns.description: Reflects flat damage back to enemies when struck. Most effective in tanky close-range builds with high armor and shield.

movement_speed.formula: Actual Speed = Base Speed × (1 + Movement Speed %)
movement_speed.description: Character velocity multiplier enhancing positioning and kiting capabilities. Can be converted to attack speed via Turbo Skates.

extra_jumps.description: Mid-air jumps available before ground contact. 3 extra jumps = 4 total jumps.

jump_height.description: Vertical leap distance affecting navigation and attack avoidance.

luck.description: Item rarity multiplier. Does NOT affect item proc chance or crit chance—only the quality of item drops.

difficulty.formula: Affects enemy quantity, health, and damage
difficulty.description: Modifies enemy stats. Does NOT increase XP drops directly, but more enemies = more XP potential.
difficulty.note: Higher difficulty = better loot but harder combat

pickup_range.formula: Character Pickup Range = Initial Range × (1 + Tome Range + Shrine Range)
pickup_range.description: XP gem collection distance. Powerup pickup range remains fixed.
pickup_range.note: Only affects XP gems, not powerups

xp_gain.formula: XP per Shard = Base × min(XP Gain %, 1000%)
xp_gain.description: Experience per shard multiplier. CAPPED AT 10x MAXIMUM (1000% XP). Beyond this, additional XP Gain has no effect.

gold_gain.description: Multiplier for gold obtained per kill and broken containers.

silver_gain.description: Permanent currency multiplier affecting post-run progression rewards.

elite_spawn_increase.formula: Elite Spawn Rate = Base × (1 + Elite Spawn %)
elite_spawn_increase.description: Enemy elite frequency multiplier. Higher difficulty but better loot opportunities.

powerup_multiplier.description: Increases magnitude and duration of temporary power buffs.

powerup_drop_chance.formula: Drop Probability = Base + Powerup Drop Chance %
powerup_drop_chance.description: Enemy powerup drop probability. ALSO increases the chance for chest drops (dual benefit).

100_percent.description: Guaranteed crits on every hit. Enables Overcrit mechanic.
100_percent.how_to_reach: Precision Tome + Forbidden Juice (10%) + Grandma's Secret Tonic (25%) + character passive

200_percent.description: Double Overcrit - 2 simultaneous crits per hit for 4.0x damage multiplier

1000_percent.description: HARD CAP - 10x XP gain maximum. No benefit beyond this point.
1000_percent.warning: Stacking more XP sources beyond 1000% is wasted

57_percent.description: Around 60% damage reduction - strong tank threshold

73_percent.description: ~75% damage reduction - extremely tanky, diminishing returns set in

67_percent.description: ~67% dodge - very hard to hit, heavy investment needed

big_bonk_100.description: 50 stacks of Big Bonk for 100% 20x damage proc rate

ice_cube_100.description: 5 stacks of Ice Cube for 100% freeze chance

spicy_meatball_100.description: 4 stacks of Spicy Meatball for 100% explosion chance

forbidden_juice_100.description: 10 stacks of Forbidden Juice for 100% crit chance (enables Overcrit)

hyperbolic_scaling.description: Returns diminish as you invest more. Impossible to reach 100%. Formula: Actual % = Internal / (constant + Internal)
hyperbolic_scaling.why_used: Prevents invincibility while maintaining value at all levels

overcrit_system.how_it_works: Each 100% crit chance = 1 simultaneous crit. Multiple crits multiply damage exponentially
overcrit_system.formula: Damage Multiplier = (n × 0.5)² + (n + 1) where n = number of crits

attack_speed_breakpoints.description: More attacks = more damage AND more proc chances
attack_speed_breakpoints.turbo_skates_interaction: Movement speed can convert to attack speed via Turbo Skates

offensive_focus.description: Maximize damage output for glass cannon builds

balanced_approach.description: Balanced offense and defense for versatile play

crit_build.description: Maximize critical hit damage with Overcrit scaling
